main.title: COVID-19 Cough Detection
main.note: Please note: This form is for data collection only. It will not predict your COVID-19 status or diagnose any disease, disorder, or other health condition. Virufy is conducting research and will use the information you provide for that research only. Virufy will not take place of a doctor and would like to remind you it is your responsibility to seek medical advice from your doctor.
main.paragraph1: Welcome! This study should only take about 5 minutes to complete.
main.introductionText: Important note: This app is only for demonstration purposes and does not provide a prediction. Please visit <2>Virufy Study to contribute your cough and help us to complete this app.
main.introductionRecomendations:
To reduce risk and self-harm, we advise you to:

Please use your own device and wear a mask when appropriate.

Disinfect your device and any affected or nearby surfaces after recording your cough/speech.

If you have an underlying condition that increases your risk from coughing, please check with your health care provider before participating.

If you feel your symptoms are getting worse, please contact your local medical response.

helpVirufy.title: About Virufy
helpVirufy.introParagraph: Welcome to our study! This should only take you about 5 minutes to complete. Before we begin, let’s discuss what we will cover:
helpVirufy.aboutParagraph:
Virufy is a nonprofit organization that is working to develop the means to use artificial intelligence (Al) to screen for COVID-19 from cough patterns rapidly and at no cost through use of a smartphone for the benefit of low-income countries.

Our team includes researchers from over 25 countries.Our research has shown that Al technology may be able to identify COVID's unique cough signature.

By collecting coughs recordings from people around the world, Virufy is improving the robustness of its AI algorithm in recognizing COVID's unique sound pattern.

You have the powerto help benefit millions of people across the globe by contributing your cough in our study.

beforeStart.title: Lastly, before we start...
beforeStart.subtitle: To ensure safety, we advise you to:
advise_list: Please use your own device and wear a mask when appropriate.
Disinfect your device and any affected or nearby surfaces after recording your cough/speech.
If you have an underlying condition that increases your risk from coughing, please check with your health care provider before participating.
If you feel your symptoms are getting worse, please contact your local medical response.

recordCough.title: Instructions
recordCough.intro1: Find a quiet environment that is 20 feet away from those around you.
recordCough.intro2: Wear a surgical or cloth mask and hold your device two hands-length away from your face.
recordCough.text: Click the record button below and cough intentionally three times with a deep breath between each cough. When you are done, tap the stop button.

recordingsIntroduction.shortRecording: Please make a recording of at least 3 seconds

recordingsRecordManual.micError: Can’t access the mic? Upload an audio file.
recordingsRecordManual.micErrorDescription: Please upload an audio file here.
recordingsRecordManual.fileDurationTooShort: Please upload a file of at least 3 seconds
recordingsRecordManual.fileSizeTooBig: Please upload a file of less than 5 MB

recordCough.intro1: Please cough away from others around you! Please sit down if you are feeling ill.
recordCough.intro2: In a quiet environment, please press record and intentionally cough around 3-5 times.

recordingsListen.title: Upload Complete
recordingsListen.subtitle: Feel free to take a listen!
